I didn't assume that. But the network is supported and secured mainly by miners. 2miners is the largest mining pool for BTG with more than 3/4 of all BTG mined. But miners need to pay their bills. So no payout: risk of losing miners. And solo miners will probably also avoid mining at current BTG prices. Doesn't that pose a risk for the network?
You can't change something in it even if you're the creator
There's no changes in the BTG network
